Html:
How can I change the thickness of the plots border? In my application I would like to display only the horizontal border right
above the MainHorizontal-Axes. I tried to set the property in Xaml and I used the following code without success?           

Thickness myBorder = new Thickness(0,0,0,10);
plotter.BorderThickness = myBorder;


Changing the Color of the ChartPlotters-Border works just fine. By the means of applying transparent -"color", the border disappears
accordingly.

 

Any suggestions would be appreciated!

Thanks,

Dominik

Hi Dominik,

plotter contains panels.Use these panels to change the properties (plotter.BottomPanel, plotter.TopPanel, ploter.RightPanel, ploter.LeftPanel etc.)

Regards

Ravi.
